SET(HTTPLIB_PKG_INCLUDE_DIRS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/libneon/src/  ${LIBSSL_PKG_INCLUDE_DIRS}  ${LIBGSSAPI_PKG_INCLUDE_DIRS} PARENT_SCOPE)
